# llms.txt
Project: fire-keeper
Repository: https://github.com/phonowell/fire-keeper
Homepage: https://github.com/phonowell/fire-keeper

Summary (EN): Pure ESM Node.js/TypeScript filesystem automation toolkit for backup, copy, remove, glob, watch, and concurrent task workflows.
摘要 (ZH): 纯 ESM 的 Node.js/TypeScript 文件系统自动化工具库，支持备份、复制、删除、匹配、监听和并发任务。

Primary use cases (EN):
- Build/deploy file workflows (copy, clean, zip)
- Batch file operations and path normalization
主要用途 (ZH):
- 构建/部署文件流转（复制、清理、压缩）
- 批量文件处理与路径规范化

Keywords (EN): nodejs, typescript, filesystem, file-operations, automation, esm, cli, glob, file-watcher, concurrency
关键词 (ZH): Node.js, TypeScript, 文件系统, 文件操作, 自动化, ESM, 命令行, glob, 文件监听, 并发

Install (EN): pnpm i fire-keeper
安装 (ZH): pnpm i fire-keeper

Quick usage (EN):
- import backup from "fire-keeper/backup.js"; await backup("./config.json")
快速使用 (ZH):
- import copy from "fire-keeper/copy.js"; await copy("./src", "./dist")

API/Docs: https://github.com/phonowell/fire-keeper/blob/main/usage.md
Examples: https://github.com/phonowell/fire-keeper/blob/main/readme.md
License: MIT
Citation: none
Contact: https://github.com/phonowell/fire-keeper/issues
